text.ascii: janamejaya uvAca
text.ur: janamejaya uvāca

text.ascii: kathitaM vai samAsena tvayA sarvaM dvijottama
text.ud: कथितं वै समासेन त्वया सर्वं द्विजोत्तम
text.ur: kathitaṁ vai samāsena tvayā sarvaṁ dvijottama

text.ascii: mahAbhAratam AkhyAnaM kurUNAM caritaM mahat
text.ur: mahābhāratam ākhyānaṁ kurūṇāṁ caritaṁ mahat

text.ascii: kathAM tv anagha citrArthAm imAM kathayati tvayi
text.ur: kathāṁ tv anagha citrārthām imāṁ kathayati tvayi

text.ascii: vistarazravaNe jAtaM kautUhalam atIva me
text.ur: vistaraśravaṇe jātaṁ kautūhalam atīva me

text.ascii: sa bhavAn vistareNemAM punar AkhyAtum arhati
text.ur: sa bhavān vistareṇemāṁ punar ākhyātum arhati

text.ascii: na hi tRpyAmi pUrveSAM zRNvAnaz caritaM mahat
text.ud: न हि तृप्यामि पूर्वेषां शृण्वानश्चरितं महत्
text.ur: na hi tr̥pyāmi pūrveṣāṁ śr̥ṇvānaś caritaṁ mahat

text.ascii: na tat kAraNam alpaM hi dharmajJA yatra pANDavAH
text.ud: न तत्कारणमल्पं हि धर्मज्ञा यत्र पाण्डवाः
text.ur: na tat kāraṇam alpaṁ hi dharmajñā yatra pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: avadhyAn sarvazo jaghnuH prazasyante ca mAnavaiH
text.ur: avadhyān sarvaśo jaghnuḥ praśasyante ca mānavaiḥ

text.ascii: kimarthaM te naravyAghrAH zaktAH santo hy anAgasaH
text.ud: किमर्थं ते नरव्याघ्राः शक्ताः सन्तो ह्यनागसः
text.ur: kimarthaṁ te naravyāghrāḥ śaktāḥ santo hy anāgasaḥ

text.ascii: prayujyamAnAn saMklezAn kSAntavanto durAtmanAm
text.ur: prayujyamānān saṁkleśān kṣāntavanto durātmanām

text.ascii: kathaM nAgAyutaprANo bAhuzAlI vRkodaraH
text.ur: kathaṁ nāgāyutaprāṇo bāhuśālī vr̥kodaraḥ

text.ascii: pariklizyann api krodhaM dhRtavAn vai dvijottama
text.ur: parikliśyann api krodhaṁ dhr̥tavān vai dvijottama

text.ascii: kathaM sA draupadI kRSNA klizyamAnA durAtmabhiH
text.ud: कथं सा द्रौपदी कृष्णा क्लिश्यमाना दुरात्मभिः
text.ur: kathaṁ sā draupadī kr̥ṣṇā kliśyamānā durātmabhiḥ

text.ascii: zaktA satI dhArtarASTrAn nAdahad ghoracakSuSA
text.ur: śaktā satī dhārtarāṣṭrān nādahad ghoracakṣuṣā

text.ascii: kathaM vyatikraman dyUte pArthau mAdrIsutau tathA
text.ur: kathaṁ vyatikraman dyūte pārthau mādrīsutau tathā

text.ascii: anuvrajan naravyAghraM vaJcyamAnaM durAtmabhiH
text.ur: anuvrajan naravyāghraṁ vañcyamānaṁ durātmabhiḥ

text.ascii: kathaM dharmabhRtAM zreSThaH suto dharmasya dharmavit
text.ud: कथं धर्मभृतां श्रेष्ठः सुतो धर्मस्य धर्मवित्
text.ur: kathaṁ dharmabhr̥tāṁ śreṣṭhaḥ suto dharmasya dharmavit

text.ascii: anarhaH paramaM klezaM soDhavAn sa yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: anarhaḥ paramaṁ kleśaṁ soḍhavān sa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: kathaM ca bahulAH senAH pANDavaH kRSNasArathiH
text.ud: कथं च बहुलाः सेनाः पाण्डवः कृष्णसारथिः
text.ur: kathaṁ ca bahulāḥ senāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ kr̥ṣṇasārathiḥ

text.ascii: asyann eko 'nayat sarvAH pitRlokaM dhanaMjayaH
text.ur: asyann eko ’nayat sarvāḥ pitr̥lokaṁ dhanaṁjayaḥ

text.ascii: etad AcakSva me sarvaM yathAvRttaM tapodhana
text.ur: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṁ yathāvr̥ttaṁ tapodhana

text.ascii: yad yac ca kRtavantas te tatra tatra mahArathAH
text.ur: yad yac ca kr̥tavantas te tatra tatra mahārathāḥ

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: maharSeH sarvalokeSu pUjitasya mahAtmanaH
text.ur: maharṣeḥ sarvalokeṣu pūjitasya mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: pravakSyAmi mataM kRtsnaM vyAsasyAmitatejasaH
text.ur: pravakṣyāmi mataṁ kr̥tsnaṁ vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥ

text.ascii: idaM zatasahasraM hi zlokAnAM puNyakarmaNAm
text.ur: idaṁ śatasahasraṁ hi ślokānāṁ puṇyakarmaṇām

text.ascii: satyavatyAtmajeneha vyAkhyAtam amitaujasA
text.ur: satyavatyātmajeneha vyākhyātam amitaujasā

text.ascii: ya idaM zrAvayed vidvAn yaz cedaM zRNuyAn naraH
text.ur: ya idaṁ śrāvayed vidvān yaś cedaṁ śr̥ṇuyān naraḥ

text.ascii: te brahmaNaH sthAnam etya prApnuyur devatulyatAm
text.ur: te brahmaṇaḥ sthānam etya prāpnuyur devatulyatām

text.ascii: idaM hi vedaiH samitaM pavitram api cottamam
text.ud: इदं हि वेदैः समितं पवित्रमपि चोत्तमम्
text.ur: idaṁ hi vedaiḥ samitaṁ pavitram api cottamam

text.ascii: zrAvyANAm uttamaM cedaM purANam RSisaMstutam
text.ur: śrāvyāṇām uttamaṁ cedaṁ purāṇam r̥ṣisaṁstutam

text.ascii: asminn arthaz ca dharmaz ca nikhilenopadizyate
text.ur: asminn arthaś ca dharmaś ca nikhilenopadiśyate

text.ascii: itihAse mahApuNye buddhiz ca parinaiSThikI
text.ur: itihāse mahāpuṇye buddhiś ca parinaiṣṭhikī

text.ascii: akSudrAn dAnazIlAMz ca satyazIlAn anAstikAn
text.ur: akṣudrān dānaśīlāṁś ca satyaśīlān anāstikān

text.ascii: kArSNaM vedam imaM vidvAJ zrAvayitvArtham aznute
text.ur: kārṣṇaṁ vedam imaṁ vidvāñ śrāvayitvārtham aśnute

text.ascii: bhrUNahatyAkRtaM cApi pApaM jahyAd asaMzayam
text.ur: bhrūṇahatyākr̥taṁ cāpi pāpaṁ jahyād asaṁśayam

text.ascii: itihAsam imaM zrutvA puruSo 'pi sudAruNaH
text.ur: itihāsam imaṁ śrutvā puruṣo ’pi sudāruṇaḥ

text.ascii: jayo nAmetihAso 'yaM zrotavyo vijigISuNA
text.ur: jayo nāmetihāso ’yaṁ śrotavyo vijigīṣuṇā

text.ascii: mahIM vijayate sarvAM zatrUMz cApi parAjayet
text.ur: mahīṁ vijayate sarvāṁ śatrūṁś cāpi parājayet

text.ascii: idaM puMsavanaM zreSTham idaM svastyayanaM mahat
text.ur: idaṁ puṁsavanaṁ śreṣṭham idaṁ svastyayanaṁ mahat

text.ascii: mahiSIyuvarAjAbhyAM zrotavyaM bahuzas tathA
text.ur: mahiṣīyuvarājābhyāṁ śrotavyaṁ bahuśas tathā

text.ascii: arthazAstram idaM puNyaM dharmazAstram idaM param
text.ur: arthaśāstram idaṁ puṇyaṁ dharmaśāstram idaṁ param

text.ascii: mokSazAstram idaM proktaM vyAsenAmitabuddhinA
text.ur: mokṣaśāstram idaṁ proktaṁ vyāsenāmitabuddhinā

text.ascii: saMpraty AcakSate caiva AkhyAsyanti tathApare
text.ur: saṁpraty ācakṣate caiva ākhyāsyanti tathāpare

text.ascii: putrAH zuzrUSavaH santi preSyAz ca priyakAriNaH
text.ur: putrāḥ śuśrūṣavaḥ santi preṣyāś ca priyakāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: zarIreNa kRtaM pApaM vAcA ca manasaiva ca
text.ud: शरीरेण कृतं पापं वाचा च मनसैव च
text.ur: śarīreṇa kr̥taṁ pāpaṁ vācā ca manasaiva ca

text.ascii: sarvaM tat tyajati kSipram idaM zRNvan naraH sadA
text.ur: sarvaṁ tat tyajati kṣipram idaṁ śr̥ṇvan naraḥ sadā

text.ascii: bhAratAnAM mahaj janma zRNvatAm anasUyatAm
text.ur: bhāratānāṁ mahaj janma śr̥ṇvatām anasūyatām

text.ascii: nAsti vyAdhibhayaM teSAM paralokabhayaM kutaH
text.ur: nāsti vyādhibhayaṁ teṣāṁ paralokabhayaṁ kutaḥ

text.ascii: dhanyaM yazasyam AyuSyaM svargyaM puNyaM tathaiva ca
text.ud: धन्यं यशस्यमायुष्यं स्वर्ग्यं पुण्यं तथैव च
text.ur: dhanyaṁ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṁ svargyaṁ puṇyaṁ tathaiva ca

text.ascii: kRSNadvaipAyanenedaM kRtaM puNyacikIrSuNA
text.ur: kr̥ṣṇadvaipāyanenedaṁ kr̥taṁ puṇyacikīrṣuṇā

text.ascii: kIrtiM prathayatA loke pANDavAnAM mahAtmanAm
text.ur: kīrtiṁ prathayatā loke pāṇḍavānāṁ mahātmanām

text.ascii: anyeSAM kSatriyANAM ca bhUridraviNatejasAm
text.ur: anyeṣāṁ kṣatriyāṇāṁ ca bhūridraviṇatejasām

text.ascii: yathA samudro bhagavAn yathA ca himavAn giriH
text.ur: yathā samudro bhagavān yathā ca himavān giriḥ

text.ascii: khyAtAv ubhau ratnanidhI tathA bhAratam ucyate
text.ur: khyātāv ubhau ratnanidhī tathā bhāratam ucyate

text.ascii: ya idaM zrAvayed vidvAn brAhmaNAn iha parvasu
text.ur: ya idaṁ śrāvayed vidvān brāhmaṇān iha parvasu

text.ascii: dhUtapApmA jitasvargo brahmabhUyaM sa gacchati
text.ur: dhūtapāpmā jitasvargo brahmabhūyaṁ sa gacchati

text.ascii: yaz cedaM zrAvayec chrAddhe brAhmaNAn pAdam antataH
text.ur: yaś cedaṁ śrāvayec chrāddhe brāhmaṇān pādam antataḥ

text.ascii: akSayyaM tasya tac chrAddham upatiSThet pitqn api
text.ur: akṣayyaṁ tasya tac chrāddham upatiṣṭhet pitr̥̄n api

text.ascii: ahnA yad enaz cAjJAnAt prakaroti naraz caran
text.ur: ahnā yad enaś cājñānāt prakaroti naraś caran

text.ascii: tan mahAbhAratAkhyAnaM zrutvaiva pravilIyate
text.ur: tan mahābhāratākhyānaṁ śrutvaiva pravilīyate

text.ascii: bhAratAnAM mahaj janma mahAbhAratam ucyate
text.ur: bhāratānāṁ mahaj janma mahābhāratam ucyate

text.ascii: niruktam asya yo veda sarvapApaiH pramucyate
text.ur: niruktam asya yo veda sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate

text.ascii: tribhir varSaiH sadotthAyI kRSNadvaipAyano muniH
text.ur: tribhir varṣaiḥ sadotthāyī kr̥ṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥ

text.ascii: mahAbhAratam AkhyAnaM kRtavAn idam uttamam
text.ur: mahābhāratam ākhyānaṁ kr̥tavān idam uttamam

text.ascii: dharme cArthe ca kAme ca mokSe ca bharatarSabha
text.ud: धर्मे चार्थे च कामे च मोक्षे च भरतर्षभ
text.ur: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: yad ihAsti tad anyatra yan nehAsti na tat kva cit
text.ur: yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kva cit
